content: introducing the quick & easy crochet bowl cozy pattern - your go-to solution for a practical and delightful kitchen accessory this beginner-friendly pattern comes with a step-by-step video tutorial ensuring that even novice crocheters can whip up these cozy delights with ease perfect for gifting selling at craft markets or simply adding a touch of charm to your own home these bowl cozies offer both style and functionality say goodbye to cold or burnt fingers and hello to handmade goodness plus with instructions included to resize the pattern you can customize your cozies to fit any bowl size start crocheting today and elevate your kitchenware game effortlessly **grab an ad-free printable version of this pattern here in my ravelry shop or here https //tidd ly/3uutmt3 in my etsy shop ** **terminology ** * us terms **langauge ** * english **supplies ** 6 0 mm j crochet hook we crochet dishie 100% cotton yarn worsted weight 4 190yds/174m 100g/3 5oz 1 skein in preferred color i used kenai and silver for my samples approx 74 g / 140 yds scissors tapestry needle stitch marker **finished size ** approx 8 wide measured across the top opening 4 75 diameter across the bottom fits a bowl with a 5 -
